amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on reconstruction efforts in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1877 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1877 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR 10/17/2003 S12710-12711) To express the sense of Congress on reconstruction efforts in Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1877 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1877 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
